title: Malzahars Ult Should Give Him Sight Of His Target.
body:
Im not quite sure why it doesn't since it would make sense both gameplay-wise and thematic-wise. It has actually cost me a few kills where i would have killed them if i could see them. Im basically tethered to them so it doesnt really make much sense why it shouldnt allow him to see them. Even if its only him gaining sight, it should still do it. Its a problem i have had for awhile i just keep forgetting to post about it haha. Just to be clear this is really only a problem because people have an instant to flash or dash before they are actually suppressed, so if they make it over a wall, around a corner, or into a bush i lose sight of them.   

What do you think?

He is somewhat wrong and also entirely wrong. Malzahar does not need a buff or a nerf, this vision thing im suggesting is not even a buff, it wont effect his power or melting ability, only his ability to ignite a target he has ulted over a wall.
Which is a buff, is it not?
Yes and no, but no not really its more of a QoL change that doesnt effect him all that much except you can ignite someone.
This is mainly my understanding of malzahar to blame, but how do you manage to ult someone over a wall, Isn't it a point and click?

Someone asked me this early and made me realize i forgot to explain how this happens in the original post. So i had to add it in a few days ago.  

Basically before you are actually officially suppressed you do have a bit of time (like a split second, really) to flash once you realize he is about to ult you. If you make it over a wall, into a bush, or around a corner that cuts off vision, Malzahar will lose sight of you. Another very common situation is for a teammate to be fighting them and then like leave the bush or flash away and you can lose sight of them that way too.

This would be true, except for that fact that there exists and item which actually hard counters malzahar... {{item:3140}} it even builds into a bigger item now. Granted there is only an AD option, it still means you can invest more into your power in the hyper late game.

I main malzahar, AP or AD, and either way a QSS is still good against him, yet of the games which i play him, i'd say only about 1/5 of the games does a single person buy a QSS.

Also if you land charm you should be able to land ur w instead of walking all te way into a not warded bush.

If its too strong, then would it be possible to make it work just around corners or something? Like it doesnt have to include bushes or over entire walls, but when they get to a blind spot around a corner i think its a bit silly i lose sight. Thank you for replying though :)
It's a bit disconcerting when you Ult an Akali and magically tether yourself to a cloud of smoke...

Im not even really talking about True Sight tbh its just annoyin when someone has time to flash over a wall, into a bush, or around a corner before actually being ulted and i have no clue where they've gone afterwards because i couldn't see them. Its worse when an ignite would have killed them if i could just see them to place it on them. Maybe i should start igniting before ulting, but then that sorta wastes my ignite if it wasnt needed. There are a lot more things you can do then just that but i think Malzahar is also twitch reflexes. How fast can you hit EWR before they leave your W.

Under what circumstances, besides mabye a graves smoke screen or a nocturne ult, do you ever lose vision of someone you ulted? Don't you have to target them which means you have vision on them anyway?

I believe i answered this in the post?  

People have time to flash or dash before they are officially Suppressed, if they make it over a wall, around a corner, or into a bush then i lose vision of them.  

EDIT: Yea i didnt say so in the post, ill put it in now.

In the ability icon it's pretty clear the beam comes from his eyes.
Who says its not both?

I feel like I'm in the minority, but I don't like it. Malz should be a melt your face off carry who has to use his full rotation to kill a guy, this could encourage him to save his ult for vision in jungle teamfights, especially in cases where the channel can be started during a blink over the wall and remain in place afterwards. That's a cool use of his ult, but I think it distracts from his proper playstyle and fantasy. Buff his power somewhere else.

Well the issue is that they have time to flash before the animation completes or whatever, they are clearly flashing after they realize im ulting them. So i dont think its fair they can flash around a corner and for whatever reason i cant see them anymore even though im shooting a beam at them. It might as well cancel the ult and just refund the mana and reset the CD. His kit is to melt someone in a 1v1 early mid game, late game he is meant to catch someone out or lock down someone in a teamfight so your team can kill the others. This vision thing sort of effects his melt ability, its not saving it for when there is vision its saving it for when they have flash down. I shouldn't have to work around someones flash, Malz's kit is suppose to be locking down someone so they can not run away.
Good point about identity, but like you said, the answer to that is to make his ult either lock down target in all cases, or refund cd/mana. Not this vision half measure.
It would be nice for now for it to give vision until they can come up with a better mechanic. It just doesnt make any sense for it not to give me vision since im like tethered to them and whatnot
I have noticed that sometimes it does give him sight and other times it does not, im not sure what the factor is.
